fields.request: Validate public chat widget accepts input when disconnected
fields.request_details:
1. Open the public site and expand the support chat drawer.
2. Before the connection completes, place focus in the message field and confirm you can type text without it being cleared or blocked.
3. Disconnect your network (or otherwise force the chat to show the disconnected status) and ensure the message input remains editable while the Send button is disabled.
4. Restore connectivity, wait for the chat to reconnect, and send the drafted message to verify it posts successfully once the connection is restored.
